hero.title: Are you struggling to find blockchain tools?

userFeedback.description: Many Bot are unable to meet the needs of crypto enthusiasts as well as Bot are unable to adapt to changes in the market in a timely manner for this reason many missed opportunities let's solve these troubles.

security.description: AGIBOT puts the safety of your money first, AGIBOT is independent of your local computer, that's why we don't do webside!

aboutUs.heading: About Us
aboutUs.description: AGI Bot is a Token batch fast only trading Robot

questions.question: AGIBOT Version
questions.answer: AGIBOT has a personal free version and Market capitalization management paid version.

questions.question: AGIBOT operating system
questions.answer: AGIBOT is available on Windows, Mac（Apple ）（Intel）  operating systems.

questions.question: Personal version, market value management version difference
questions.answer: The personal version is free and provides a basic trading function, while the market value management version provides advanced trading functions and market capitalization management.
